price: 36 Satan dit : « Accorde-moi, Seigneur, un sursis jusqu’au Jour où les hommes seront ressuscités. »
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
